answerText: The House of the Spirits [or La casa de los espiritus][10] This Chilean author made her name with The House of the Spirits and later penned Daughter of Fortune and Portrait in Sepia.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 5 | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Early on in this novel, a prophecy is fulfilled by the death of Rosa the Beautiful. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Esteban becomes enraged at Pedro Tercero after he discovers that Pedro is sleeping with his daughter, Blanca. Esteban later befriends his granddaughter from the liaison, Alba.
